name: TP - RUSH!
description:
Now when we're sitting here in our toilet paper fortresses, there are those less fortunate who are also affected by this pandemic.

I've made this silly game as an excuse to ask you to help. If you enjoyed it please donate any amount to one of these international organisations, or find ones in your community that need help in this crisis.

MEDECINES SANS FRONTIERS

WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION

RED CROSS/RED CRESCENT

AMNESTY INTERNATIONAL

CONTROLS
  • "Arrow keys/WASD" - move
  • "P" - Pause
  • "X" - Select
Thank you Britt Björkman for support and play-testing.
